channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Photoneo launches MotionCam-3D Color (Blue) to improve robot perception
item.description: The new MotionCam-3D Color (Blue) sensor enables more robust and accurate scanning for industrial applications, says Photoneo. The post Photoneo launc...

item.title: Enchant launches zero-equity accelerator for gaming and AI startups
item.description: Enchant is launching a new zero-equity accelerator for gaming and AI startups, with applications now open for its three-month program.

item.title: This investor banks on Munger’s advice to ride out volatility in markets and Tesla
item.description: Money manager Christopher Tsai says he pays scant attention to daily market ups and downs, except to look for stock opportunities.

item.title: The Download: the desert data center boom, and how to measure Earth’s elevations

item.title: Buyers are gaining the upper hand in a shifting housing market. ‘Everybody wants a deal.’
item.description: A shift is happening during the busiest season for the real-estate industry.

item.title: Surge in Treasury yields points to U.S. debt concerns as Trump’s tax bill advances. Investors want this fix.
item.description: There’s a list of things the White House could do to lower yields, but signing an executive order isn’t one of them, one portfolio manager said.

item.title: My husband and I used joint funds to renovate and prepare his house for sale. Do I now own half?
item.description: “My name is not on the deed to that rental home, but we have been married 15 years.”

item.title: Advance Auto Parts’ stock rockets as tariffs didn’t change the earnings outlook
item.description: On Thursday, the company said it’ll handle the extra costs tied to the current tariff regime and still deliver its full-year earnings targets.

item.title: AMD unveils new Threadripper CPUs and Radeon GPUs for gamers at Computex 2025
item.description: AMD held a Computex press event to introduce its Radeon RX 9060 XT graphics cards and Threadripper CPUs for next-gen gaming and workstations.

item.title: OpenAI updates its new Responses API rapidly with MCP support, GPT-4o native image gen, and more enterprise features

item.title: Mistral AI launches Devstral, powerful new open source SWE agent model that runs on laptops
item.description: Beyond performance and portability, its Apache 2.0 license offers a compelling proposition for commercial applications.
